name: chalvh Smart Watch, 1.69-Inch Touch Screen Smart Watches for Men Women, 12 Sports Modes Activity Tracker with Sleep and Heart Rate Monitor, IP68 Waterproof Fitness Watch for Android iOS
discription:
1.69" Touch Screen and Exquisite Design: Our smartwatch adopt a 1.69" full-color screen, high sensitivity touch, and strong and durable 2.5D glass. And it has a 262K color-true high-definition color gamut, 235PPI super retina screen, and 240 * 280 HD resolution, which delivers an ultra-clear and wide viewing experience. This watch for men has been sandblasted on the surface and IP electroplating process, making the watch body more wear-resistant, corrosion-resistant, and heat shock resistant.
24 Hours Health Monitoring: chalvh activity trackers help us to know more about health. These smart watches have heart rate monitors, sleep tracker functions, and so forth. chalvh watches use an intelligent algorithm to monitor our heart rate in real-time and we can better understand our condition. And it tracks our sleep through a comprehensive analysis of sleep quality data to help us better grasp the health changes. But the data is just used for reference.
Our Life Smart Assistant: By connecting fitness tracker to our mobile phone, we can receive vibration reminders of text messages, calls, and SNS, so we will never miss any significant notification. Smart watch supports more daily practical tools, like an alarm clock, music control, weather forecast, sedentary reminder, remote camera, finding the watch, etc. This watch can be a smart assistant in our life to help us live more conveniently, more intelligently, and more healthily.
12 Sports Modes and GPS Activity Tracking: Sports watch supports 12 sports modes, including Walking, Running, Cycling, Skipping Rope, Basketball, etc. These fitness watches for man women help keep track of our daily activity data like steps, calories burned, distance, and active hours and generate data. Meanwhile, this step counter watch can record real-time routes of our outdoor activities, and the GPS on our phone can show the data like distance and record a map of our workout route.
Wide Compatibility and Personalized Watch: Smart bracelet is compatible with smartphones that use iOS 9.0/Android OS 4.4 or above, and Bluetooth 4.0 or above. And Lrecat running watch also has more than 200 exquisite watch faces in the "Da Fit" APP for us to choose from. We can even customize the watch face, setting our favorite photo from the phone album as its screen background.
